name: Intruder (itch) (Jesse)
description:
Intruder is a Story Driven 2D Shooter. The house has been broken into and you are the only one with a gun. 

Fight your way through the game while slowly learning about your friend's past. 

Who knows? Maybe it will help shed light on the whole situation.

Aiming is standard 2D shooter controls and R is used to shoot and reload  your gun.

Good luck and enjoy the story.
